faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: 1ðŸ’—1 is a platform for managing agreements and collaborations. It enables people to create groups ('rikmas') around shared goals, negotiate and reach agreements in a transparent and organized way.
faq.q2: What's the difference between 1ðŸ’—1 and the agreement site?
faq.a2: 1ðŸ’—1 (1lev1.com) is the collaboration platform â€“ the place where you create rikmas, manage projects and work together. agreement.1lev1.com is an independent site dedicated to the global vision of the worldwide agreement.
faq.q3: Is it mandatory to visit the full agreement site?
faq.a3: No! You can agree to the basic agreement (checkbox in the form) and continue straight to registration. The full agreement site is an optional extension for those who want to join the global vision.
faq.q4: What happens when I return from the full agreement site?
faq.a4: You automatically return to the registration page with confirmation that you have signed. The details you filled in the form are saved and you can continue directly to registration.
faq.a5: A rikma is a group in 1ðŸ’—1 created around a shared goal. Like fabric weaving â€“ different threads that together create something whole and beautiful. Each member is a thread, and together they create the rikma.
faq.a6: After registration you can join existing rikmas, create a new rikma, manage projects and work with people from around the world â€“ all by mutual consent.
